articles.title: FIFA World Cup: Fans in Qatar pay homage to Diego Maradona with shirts and chants
articles.description: More than 30,000 Argentina fans are in Qatar for this year's tournament and while many worship Messi, Maradona's name still carries an almost mystical force.
articles.content:
Doha: Javier Maluf will quietly put on a shirt worn by Diego Maradona against England, but other fans at the World Cup have more noisy plans for Friday’s second anniversary of the death of the flawed genius.
